summary.span: 包含用于在属性值和字符串之间进行转换的帮助器函数。

span.span: Contains helper functions to convert property values to and from strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可由 ASP.NET 页面框架并不能在代码中直接访问。The class is used by the ASP.NET page framework and is not intended to be accessed directly from your code. 你可以使用结构将字符串值转换到和从枚举器，或将对象转换。You can use the structure to convert string values to and from enumerators, or to convert objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于将字符串值转换为对象。The method is used to convert a string value to an object. > [!NOTE] > 此成员支持 .NET Framework 结构，不能在代码中直接使用。This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 若要将一个字符串值转换为一个对象，使用`Parse`方法为该对象，如果该对象提供`Parse`方法。To convert a string value to an object, use the `Parse` method for that object if the object provides a `Parse` method. 例如，可以从通过字符串创建对象方法。For example, an object can be created from a string through the method.
